msbt.message: Isn't Bunny Day absolutely fabulous, ?I mean, it's a holiday that gives us permission to find and eat as much candy as possible! Guilt-free! What's NOT to love, darling?

Say, , have you been to visit Zipper yet?That bouncing bunny is certainly doing his darndest to make Bunny Day fabulous for everyone. But my goodness, the energy he puts into it. So much hippity! So much hoppity! How DOES he do it? I tell you darling, just watching him spring about like that wears me out.

Why, , did you know that Bunny Day eggs are edible? It's true! It's true! They're made out of candy, !Yes, it is a shame to break their pretty shellsbut if they taste as good as they look, it'll be worth it!

I've been wondering about those balloons floating through the air. Are there more today than usual? I keep hoping they might float down to the groundbut they always remain out of reach, . Ugh! It's like they're taunting me! There MUST be some way to bring them down

I saw a message bottle on the beach a moment ago. I tell you, it was adorable! I wonder who might have sent it, ? It wasn't like the others. Ah well, I'm sure some lucky beachcomber will find out. Perhaps it'll be you, darling.

My goodness, but I do have Bunny Day on the brain.Even some of the balloons flying over the island are starting to look like eggs to me. Mmm, I wonder if they are edible as wellOh no, now I'm craving delicious candy eggs, !

I must tell you what happened to me! So there I was, looking up at a tree when I spotted this strange fruit Needless to say, I gave the tree a good shakeand that's when an egg fell out! A brightly colored egg! I was quite startled, of course. I mean, it nearly conked me right on the head! What if it had been a rock or something?! I might have ended up with a goose egg on my head! Eggs falling from treeseggs on my head Long story short, eggs are turning up in the strangest places!

You won't believe it! I was doing a bit of fishing a moment ago and you'll never guess what I reeled in! No! Not a fish, silly! An EGG!What kind of egg could it possibly be?! It's much too large to be a fish egg, and much too colorful as well Oh dear, I do love a good mystery, !
, it's so fun to see you on Bunny Day! Shall we commence with the finding of eggs?
How IS your Bunny Day going so far, ? I hope you're having as much fun as I am!
Say, I have a Bunny Day proposal for you, Would you be interested in receiving 3 of my for 3 eggs of a different type?
Let's do it!
No, thanks.
Now that we're here talking and holding various eggsit seems almost wasteful not to make a trade!What would you say to 3 of my for 3 of another type from you?
Let's trade!
I'll pass, but thanks.
Splendid! Now then, which eggs will you be trading to me?
How lovely! So, would you mind showing me which eggs will soon be in my possession?
Thank you kindly! I feel like we're living the true spirit of Bunny Day right now
I'd almost feel bad using the eggs I got from you. Maybe I'll just hold on to them forever Thank you!
Not interested? Well, I'm glad I didn't put all my eggs in THAT basket! It's quite alright!
Oh, , that's alright. Did I come on too strong? No, no, I'm quite sure I didn't
Very wellâ€”let's just make sure we're all on the same page, shall we?The trade will be my 3 for 3 of your .
That sounds right.
Actually, let's not.
Excellent! It still sounds good to me too. So, without further ado
Oh, but you don't have enough room to complete this transaction, do you?Let's pretend none of this ever happened. Until it happens again. I may forget and offer a new trade
